mapper.select: SELECT C_ID id, C_USERNAME username, C_CITY city, C_COUNTRY country, C_GENDER gender, C_IMAGE_URL imageUrl, C_POINT point, C_PROVINCE province, C_OPEN_ID openid FROM t_user WHERE C_OPEN_ID = #{openid};
SELECT C_ID id, C_USERNAME username, C_CITY city, C_COUNTRY country, C_GENDER gender, C_IMAGE_URL imageUrl, C_POINT point, C_PROVINCE province, C_OPEN_ID openid FROM t_user WHERE C_ID = #{id};

SELECT e.*, u.C_USERNAME publisherName, cd.C_NAME typeName, p.C_ID as pictureId,p.C_URL as pictureUrl,p.C_EVENT_ID as eventId FROM (t_event e, t_user u, t_category_detail cd) LEFT JOIN t_picture p ON e.C_ID = p.C_EVENT_ID WHERE e.C_PUBLISHER_ID = u.C_ID AND e.C_TYPE_ID = cd.C_ID AND e.C_PUBLISHER_ID = #{userId}

SELECT e.*, u.C_USERNAME publisherName, cd.C_NAME typeName, p.C_ID as pictureId,p.C_URL as pictureUrl,p.C_EVENT_ID as eventId FROM (t_event e, t_user u, t_category_detail cd) LEFT JOIN t_picture p ON e.C_ID = p.C_EVENT_ID WHERE e.C_PUBLISHER_ID = u.C_ID AND e.C_TYPE_ID = cd.C_ID AND exists(SELECT C_EVENT_ID FROM t_event_att et WHERE et.C_ATTEND_USER_ID = #{userId} AND e.C_ID = et.C_event_id)
